page.title: 04AMENITIES IN NEW MALDEN
page.content: TEENAGERS AND CHILDREN IN THE AREA HAVE SEVERAL AMENITIES WHICH THEY CAN USE.THERE ARE SEVERAL YOUTH CLUBS AS WELL AS YOUTH GROUPS THAT CATER FOR THE MUSICALLY ABLE IN THE FORM OF MARCHING BANDS.THERE ARE ALSO TWO ATHLETICS CLUBS AND SEVERAL SQUASH,BADMINTON, TENNIS AND CRICKET CLUBS.RECENTLY A NEW SWIMMING POOL WAS BUILT IN KINGSTON- UPON-THAMES WHICH ATTRACTS MANY PEOPLE FROM OUR AREA.PROXIMITY TO LONDON IS AN ADDED ATTRACTION BECAUSE PEOPLE CAN MAKE USE OF ALL THAT LONDON OFFERS IN TERMS OF AMENITIES AND ENTERTAINMENT. IN OUR AREA THERE ARE THREE GOOD SHOPPING CENTRES WHICH CATER FOR ALL FAMILY NEEDS.THE AREA IS ALSO WELL SERVED BY DOCTORS,DENTISTS,LIBRARIES AND OTHER PUBLIC AMENITIES.
